1.0.name: wordpress/easy-accordion
1.0.description:
A wordpress plugin that allows you to add a accordion slider to your site.

Easy Accordion has been built using some code and ideas from the following people:

Nicola Hibbert - http://accordionpro.nicolahibbert.com/

Andrea Cima Serniotti - http://www.madeincima.it/en/articles/resources-and-tools/easy-accordion-plugin/

Slide Deck - http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/slidedeck-lite-for-wordpress/
